author: Kimberley B
title: A modern, clean, stylish hotel with a superb location.
text:
I cannot recommend this hotel enough. The location is central to all the main attractions. The rooms are small, but perfectly formed with modern decor and a high level of cleanliness. We enjoyed a wonderful stay and could not fault a thing.
They provide some lovely touches that are not always standard in hotels such as free wifi in all rooms, complementary tea and cakes mid-afternoon, free safety deposit box and fresh bottled water. We would definitely return - thank you for a great stay!
